entry.title: Game of Thrones - Season 5 - Episode 8 - Hardhome (3)
entry.content:
Game of Thrones - Season 5 - Episode 8 - Hardhome (3)20170719
The events at Hardhome are so intense. However, I can't believe
that Jon doesn't freak out more when he gets back to Castle
Black. He should spend more time worrying about the Army of the
Dead, convincing people, gathering Dragon-glass, and so on.

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 6: Brave New World (FF6 rom hack) (SNES, 2013) (8)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 6: Brave New World (FF6 rom hack) (SNES, 2013) (8)20170718
I went from the end of the night in Thamasa until the beginning of
the World of Ruin. I took Cyan, Sabin, and Celes to the Floating
Continent. It was really tough, but I had a good system. I really
like the change that Celes gets Leo's sword. I wonder if she will
keep it in the WoR. This is a great mod!

Total time: 16:35
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 6: Brave New World (FF6 rom hack)
  • SNES
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: FTL: Faster Than Light (Steam, 2012) (4)
entry.content:
Game: FTL: Faster Than Light (Steam, 2012) (4)20170718
This is my plan:
Sector   1: Shields 2, Engines 4, Medbay 2
Sector 2-4: Doors, Drones
Sector 5-7: Shields 3, Engines 5, All 2

I am almost at the end and I am doing really well. I got quite a
few good weapon upgrades. I really like having many different
weapons shooting at the same time. I have high hopes for this run.

I went up against the leader and was totally destroyed. My pilot
area was hacked and on fire, so I couldn't escape. He died and
then it was really down hill after that. Ouch. I guess I'll try
again.

--

I did a few experiments with things like boarding and cloaking,
but couldn't use them very well. It was frustrating.

--

I won my first two rounds with the big ship but died after
that. It was a bummer. I think I wasted a repair cycle. I did it
again and this time I had a Hull Repair drone. I think that made
all the difference, because I never deployed my drones except for
that and a Systems Repair one. This made it so I could heal during
battle and I did it! Woo!

I can see why this was such a huge hit, but I feel like a lot of
the complicated stuff, like Cloaking and micro-management of where
your characters are is not my cup of tea. Then, what is left is
pretty funny, but also a bit too much of "stand around waiting
until something happens". I feel like a more efficient
(i.e. turn-based) version of the game would be more obviously less
interesting, almost like a clicker.

Total time: 13:04
  • Video Games
  • FTL: Faster Than Light
  • Steam
  • 2012

entry.title: Game of Thrones - Season 5 - Episode 4 - The Sons of the Harpy (3)
entry.content:
Game of Thrones - Season 5 - Episode 4 - The Sons of the Harpy (3)20170718
I didn't notice that Jaime saw Tarth, where Brienne is from! The
scene with Shireen is particularly sad given what happens
next. Comparing Littlefinger's plan for Sansa to what happens is
pretty incredible. I think I believe him, though, that he truly
meant for that to happen. Even though it was so lame how Ser
Barristan died, it is impressive that he took so many Harpies
with him.
  • TV Shows
  • Game of Thrones

entry.title: Game of Thrones - Season 5 - Episode 5 - Kill the Boy (3)
entry.content:
Game of Thrones - Season 5 - Episode 5 - Kill the Boy (3)20170718
The scene where Dany takes the leaders to the dragons is cool,
but I'm not totally sure what the point is. Tormund's reaction is
great when he talks to Jon. I can't really tell what Miranda
actually thinks about Ramsay. What a horrible dinner for
Sansa... I wonder if things could have been different if Stanis
really just focused on the Army of the Dead. He seemed to take
the problem quite seriously. It's cool that Drogon is just
hanging out in Valyeria.
  • TV Shows
  • Game of Thrones

entry.title: Game of Thrones - Season 5 - Episode 6 - Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken (3)
entry.content:
Game of Thrones - Season 5 - Episode 6 - Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken (3)20170718
It is interesting in the conversation between Cersei and
Littlefinger, it seems like Cersei didn't actually send for
him. His plan seems like it will both help him and Sansa, but on
the surface it really isn't. I wonder what the end of Bronne's
song was. It sounded like a doosey. Sansa is very tough with
Miranda. It's so crazy how evil Ramsay is. "He never saw a puppy
he didn't kick."
  • TV Shows
  • Game of Thrones

entry.title: Movie: The Last Airbender, by M Night Shaymalan (2010)
entry.content:
Movie: The Last Airbender, by M Night Shaymalan (2010)20170718
This is a really bad example of whitewashing. I can see what the
actor playing Sokka is trying to do, but he isn't very good at
it. Aang's costume is really lame. Katara's actress is pretty bad
too and Zuko is too weirdly grumpy.

This was a really bad movie. I think worst part was how lame the
bending looked. Sometimes it looked like someone was doing a
stretching yawn.
  • Movies
  • 2010

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 6: Brave New World (FF6 rom hack) (SNES, 2013) (7)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 6: Brave New World (FF6 rom hack) (SNES, 2013) (7)20170717
I went through Vector and have the freedom to drive the airship
wherever I want. I'm annoyed that I can only bank 30 SP. It is
nice to get Terra back though. Cyan and Sabin are practically
unstoppable.

--

I played again later and got to Thamasa. It was pretty hard,
because Locke and Terra were so weak, but Strago's Aqua Rake is
awesome.

I feel like there are many subtle hints to the deeper meaning of
the plot, like Celes being a spy and Shadow being related to Relm
that I never saw before, but maybe it is just this translation and
it is not in the original.

Total time: 13:58
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 6: Brave New World (FF6 rom hack)
  • SNES
  • 2013

entry.content:
